definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
to put into gear/to engage the gear/gear change
(in a manual car) gear (i.e. reverse, neutral, 1st, 2nd etc)/(automatic car) transmission mode (P, R, N, D etc)/(electric fan etc) speed setting
to step on the brake/to brake (when driving)
see 放空擋|放空挡[fang4 kong1 dang3]
angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
